name: Thule Chariot XC Ski/Hiking Kit - Children
description: Introduce your child to cross-country outdoor fun. With the skis attached, it's a cross-country ski pulk, without them it's a pull-behind trailer for running or hiking.Length of tow bars is adjustable to user’s preference and desired activity.Simple installation by clicking the kit into Thule VersaWing.Kit includes 2 lightweight skis, 2 telescoping tow bars, a padded waist belt with bottle holder and locking pin.Compatible with the Thule® Chariot Sport, Chariot Cross, Chariot Cab, Chariot Lite, and Chariot Cheetah XT trailers.
